  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public abstract class TrackingTemplate
extends ThreadedController
    A multithreading-enabled template OpMode that makes use of ezpos to track the robot's virtualized pose estimate.
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
